website_summaries.verdict: For something low on sugar but high on protein, this is your best bet.
pros: This hearty blend of seeds, nuts, and berries is a great choice for anyone looking for an unsweetened mix
Customers enjoy this mix as a snack or as an addition to salad
One of the healthiest mixes available
cons: Some customers found this mix bland, and a few received packs that contained less than 20 oz

customer_reviews.title: Best mix I've ever had...
customer_reviews.text: Will order again! Ordered again! FANTASTIC! I wonder if the folks submitting negative reviews were expecting equal parts of salt, sugar and oil as nuts and berries? Also, I imagine many folks may have never experienced fresh raw nuts and expect them to be roasted in heavy oil and salt to be crunchy and junk food. This is real food, not junk food!
customer_reviews.author: W.D.

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a good mix that doesn't have things I'm allergic to (milk in chocolate pieces, peanuts, etc.). This mix is great! Really flavorful and very fresh. Even the goji berries are soft! Plus it's a nice mix of nuts, and not just a ton of the cheapest ones, either. Usually when a mix says "brazil nuts", they mean "three point eight per package, at the bottom". Not this mix! I'm very impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie T

customer_reviews.title: The Best Raw "superfoods" Trail Mix
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best raw "superfoods" trail mix I've had in quite a while, at a reasonable price. With forty years of veganism, and fifty of Organic gardening and enthusiasm, my product choices have evolved with regard to standards of excellence. For this sort of product, freshness, rawness and palatability are paramount. Organic sourcing is important, but I've had more than my share of 100% Organic-sourced products that were not fresh and showed significant signs of questionable quality control. This mix is partly Organically sourced, is delicious, is fresh, is raw and is priced right. And my mouth is watering thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence from Hackensack

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!
customer_reviews.text: It's always a pleasure to know honest business and a good product. Thank you ! Why is Linear Programming used in so many trail mixes along with cheap ingredients mixed in just to increase profits? ... is truly disgusting. But this trail mix is honest clean and delicious trail mix again thank you! Lastly, I'm diabetic and consider myself a measuring stick when it comes to trail mixes as I often can not have ones with raisin and added sugar (a way of increasing profits), but I did manage to enjoy this trail mix despite my American demise. Thanks again !
customer_reviews.author: Mike Razavi

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to this product, but I think this mix is great! There's the perfect balance of fruit and nuts. I'd never had goji berries and had no idea what to expect, but they are a superfood, and delicious as well; not as tart as cranberries, so they sort of "take up the middle" in taste. It's a little expensive for a trail mix, but not for raw nuts. The raw nuts have a different feeling in the mouth, which I prefer, and unlike nut mixes, spares the salt. In fact, we're reordering even as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought some to try out on a recent backpacking trip. It's delicious, and really hits the spot when you're putting on miles and don't want to stop for a sit-and-eat meal. I share the sentiments of the other reviewer that it would be nice to have almonds in it, but there's quite a good variety already. I probably will add some almonds to the next batch.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco D'Anconia

customer_reviews.title: Pure simple perfect = superfood.
customer_reviews.text: So good! As a snack or a meal or even a dessert. Nuts and berries never tasted and satisfied...so good! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cody & Lisa Young

customer_reviews.title: A very good FRESH mix
customer_reviews.text: A very good FRESH mix. Sold at a lower price than my local coop sells a very similar blend of ingredients. I will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: LambofGoth

customer_reviews.title: Different.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and decided to give it a try. I love trail mix and decided this would be a healthier version. Several of the berries I had never tried. I opened this and gave it a try. I found the golden raisins to be dry and hard the mulberries had some stems still attached and I found the texture strange. This is a Good mix I however picked out all of the golden raisins and mulberries so I had about a half of bag left. Maybe I should stick to what I know.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: defective.
customer_reviews.text: The box had food in the bottom, then when I looked over the package, there was a hole in the bottom. not sure if a mouse got into the package or not. I want a replacement or my money refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Weeks

customer_reviews.title: The flavors in this mix are AMAZING See day 2 update!
customer_reviews.text: The combination of the fruits and nuts in this mix make it hard to put down - it's ADDICTIVE!! Love the blend and everything in it is fresh and delicious. I will be buying this product again! Day 2 and I like this even better than the first day I opened it. THE BEST TRAIL MIX I've ever tried. The crunch of the nuts, the sweetness of the berries and there's one slightly tart berry in there too - DELICIOUS!! Kudos to the creator of this particular mixture!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Raw Superfoods Trail Mix, a mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: No sugar and salt added, and the ingredients are good. But the packaging is diabolical, and when you get to the bottom you have about a pound of goofy seeds. The seams on the top are so short after opening you can't really get a grip on them to open the bag. I keep pliers handy. They used to make a better mix without the seeds, and with packaging suitable for human hands, but it seems to be discontinued. Go fig.
customer_reviews.author: F. Pitas

customer_reviews.title: A Natural Trail Mix
customer_reviews.text: I bought Superfoods Trailmix by accident, actually...but was pleased once I looked thru the packaging and decided to open and try it. I was pleasantly surprised by the unaltered state of the individual nuts and seeds and berries-I mean they were just nuts and seeds and berries, not sugar coated, salted or altered to appear more than what they are naturally. Recommend to those who are seeking natural foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Ward

customer_reviews.title: So Many Different Nuts and Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered this thinking it was my Raw Superfoods Salad Topper which I use for so many things other than salads. I use it in my Oatmeal, on my Yogurt every night. Anyway, I tried the seeds and nut trail mix and LOVED It. Strangely, I got on Amazon right now to order another Raw Superfood Trail Mix. How is that for a coincidence? And they wanted me to review it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Eoll

customer_reviews.title: For Extreme Sunflower Seed Fans Only!
customer_reviews.text: The package should be more honest about the quantity of sunflower seeds. It’s a good 50% of the package. While I love sunflower seeds I’ve never been big on eating handfuls of them with a four goji berries and a cashew.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more clean definition on packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I expected when I ordered. Absolutely no seasoning whatsoever. Didn't want much salt, but could have used something. A little tasteless. Some parts of it were too hard for me. Will not repurchase, will look for something more like I want. We follow a clean eating diet and thought this would be fine. Apparently mixed for a more severe approach.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ramey Hill

customer_reviews.title: Careful: Almost chipped a tooth!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is pretty decent, but about halfway through the bag I did into something that felt like a stone. was a little cautious eating any of this after that since it hurt biting into it. Would definitely recommend caution when eating the snack to make sure that you don't get my dental bill along with your snack time. The object I bit into was small, about raising sized, and looked about like a petrified raisin. Seems like a pit of some kind made it into the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Just started on a low carb diet a couple of weeks ago, so this fits the bill perfectly! Love the white mulberries and goji berries, just a hint of sweetness to balance out the raw nuts! This is my second bag and I have to pace myself because it is SO good! Wish it was a little less pricey, otherwise no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Always an RN

customer_reviews.title: Raw Superfoods Trail Mix
customer_reviews.text: The Superfoods Trail Mix is a pretty good product, the flavors are dry because there is no salt in the product but the nuts are crisp and berries are flavorful and taste fresher than the similar store brands. The packaging is terrific because it's a thicker material and the zip lock top stays when closed when zipped therefore keeping everything fresh and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: What a healthy mix!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I have more energy and mental clarity after eating this very filling food. Normally we can pig out on nuts but the added berries are very satisfying. Neither of us could eat more than the recommended amount. We have discovered that this needs to be a mid morning snack because we get too energized to get to sleep at our normal time. What a great problem to have!
customer_reviews.author: B. Mastro

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy and filling during long hikes
customer_reviews.text: This trail mix was our savior on our last week-long road trip in the Oregon-Washington area. It was probably our healthiest snack, had tons of nuts and dried fruit (which we each had our favorites and our mehs), and was large enough to split for a good number of hikes (the dog didn't get any though, so I don't think she'd rate it highly). I was really impressed in terms of nutrition and would definitely buy again for another long road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Use for salad, breakfast cereal, as snack or smoothies topper,
customer_reviews.text: No added sugar like many other nut mixes. Good Variety of seeds and berries. Used with instant oat and milk/yoghurt as my healthy no added sugar breakfast. Consumed so fast did not take pic. Ordered another one same brand but try a different mix this time. Wish they have some mix with dried banana and mango
customer_reviews.author: linh

customer_reviews.title: The best trail mix I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trail mix I've ever had. Hands down. I don't like peanuts, and I don't like raisins, and sweets like M&Ms totally contradict the point of eating trail mix. This one has none of that. Instead has a great blend of the healthy ingredients. Many of which I would not enjoy on their own... But in this combo works very well. And much of them are raw! So no nutrition loss. This will be my go-to for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Trail Mix on the market, bar none! I had one little mishap with a product ONE time out of dozens of orders with these guys and they sent a fresh new bag IMMEDIATELY! I simply can't tell you enough times how great their products are. I've tried their mixed nuts, brazil nuts, berry and nuts, and now the Trail Mix. Simply OUTSTANDING. Just buy it and start LOVING it.
customer_reviews.author: ElNora

customer_reviews.title: Not sickening sweet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good trail mix as trail mixes go. Wish they had more dried fruit in place of the raisins, but at least there is no added sugar or honey, so it isn't sickening sweet. I guess it has berries in it as it says, but I would have to look. I think I would make my own though.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Glad to Try Something Different.
customer_reviews.text: Assuming labelling is accurate and the health benefits of this mix are as good as I've learned, this mix will stay on my favorites list as the flavor is great too! It's the fruit mixture that gives this a bit of sweetness and also a bit of an exotic flair. Betting that's the goji berries!
customer_reviews.author: Yolander

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this at all. Sorry. It tasted stale, maybe because I usually make my own with freshly purchased ingredients. That said, so far I haven't purchased any pre-made trail mixes that tasted good. So no more looking for a shortcut! I'll just make my own!
customer_reviews.author: JSNELL

customer_reviews.title: The Best! No Contest!
customer_reviews.text: Best trail mix I've ever had. Good mix of nuts and variety of berries, sweet and tart, well-balanced. (Zero pepitas, so someone was writing a review for the wrong product.) No added anything--no salt, no sugar, no dreaded carob chips! A delicious late afternoon snack to ward off the 3 PM slump. Highly recommended. Will buy again. And again. And probably again.
customer_reviews.author: ilovebooks4kids

customer_reviews.title: Not all organic, packaging could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Package is sealed really close ziplock so it is hard to cut open and reseal. Only the berries are organic and most of the nuts are cashews. Flavor was ok, but for the price I was expecting all the nuts to be organic too.
customer_reviews.author: DJ HERE

customer_reviews.title: AWLFUL
customer_reviews.text: i was very disappointed with this product// it was stal and the nuts had a funny taste//. in plain english it was just awlful// will never buy again// and oh i could not find the date for quality on the bag. big waste of money would not buy again or recormend.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrri

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?? Be weary--seller doesn't refund
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received a bad batch or what but it was disgusting. I like all of the ingredients, not a preference issue. I opened the bag and it smelled off. Tasted some and it was in fact gross, both the nuts and fruit in the mix had taken on the taste of the off smell. Went straight in the trash. This seller doesn't refund, thankfully Amazon customer service reimbursed me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety, Raw Trailmix...Big Fan, will order again
customer_reviews.text: Trail Mix is great. Good variety, just wish it had almonds! I put this in my greek yogurt every morning for a power packed start to my day.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Grant

customer_reviews.title: Don't eat it if you are in any way sedentary.
customer_reviews.text: While its taste was ok, some of the nuts and seeds were rancid, which rendered the rest of the product inedible. This stuff is designed for people who are extremely physically active. Its calories per 1/4 cup were very high.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: B-
customer_reviews.text: Seller seems to have changed products/packaging. Lots of tough, not edible dried dates used as filler.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This is for The Works option - I love it. Almost past tense, "loved" it, because it's already nearly gone. I could have eaten it all in one sitting. Wonderful blend, and all of it tastes like healthy, raw food! Is there a bigger bag than the one I got, like a bag that would fill up my bathtub? I want that.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbit RockstarTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but fresh, some very sour berries.
customer_reviews.text: I would love this without the golden berries. Had to remove, Wayyy too tart for me. Don't get much in the bag for the price but the quality is very good. I had to add a couple of packs of spicy peanuts and M&Mswith peanuts to stretch my bag, in addition to ferreting out all those pucker-bomb golden berries.
customer_reviews.author: Slagathor

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, interesting trail mix
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fresh nuts and dried fruits! Packaging works well for freshness and the Brazil nuts and walnuts are in sufficient quantity with the raisins and goji berries. I'll definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This mix is out of this world. Very fresh and tasting great. Has tons of hazelnuts and mulberries (my favorite) which are almost impossible to find in regular store mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Incredible superfoods!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a tremendous combo of trail mix, and I'm SOLD. Raw Superfoods has a great combo of nuts, seeds, and fruit so that one is not overbearing to the other, which is hard to do. I wish the bags were much larger but it's not so I have to buy lots of bags. A++
customer_reviews.author: Midwest_tino

customer_reviews.title: Don't eat all at once!
customer_reviews.text: There really are superfoods in this. Be careful though because too much is a bad thing. The biggest threat is the Brazil nuts. Doctors have recommended 1 to 2 brazil nuts a day (of which are in in this mix) because of the high concentration of selenium. There are also mulberries in this, which are rare, and EXPENSIVE to buy. The mulberries are easily my favorite part of the trail mix.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo good
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect too much because I have seen similar products in the market and they looked just normal. However, tonight, after I had a bunch of walnuts and almond from other packages but still didn't feel satisfied, I opened this package. I tried both dried fruits and nuts. They are just so good. Perfect taste and fresh. I tried so hard to put it back to the shelf. Don't miss it if you're looking for healthy food for after-workout supplements.
customer_reviews.author: yuepan

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, tasty trail mix.
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to eat healthier I found this trail mix. I liked that it has no additives or sugar. I was not disappointed! The bag is packed full with a wonderful variety of nuts, seeds and fruit. The first bag seemed to have more sunflower seeds, but that was fine with me. I will be a repeat customer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Raw Superfoods Trail Mix - The Works
customer_reviews.text: I usually mix up my own trail mix, but was in a hurry. Ordered this because it contained many of the fruits and nuts that I use. I added pistachios and dried cherries and it all went together well.
customer_reviews.author: fairdinkum

customer_reviews.title: Worth It 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: When I crave chocolate lately this is what I crave. Relatively Keto friendly (in moderation bc of natural sugar in fruits) 0 sugar added, healthy fats from nuts. I’m in love with this stuff. It is on the expensive side, but that is justifiable by the quality of this mix. 10/10 will be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: AngelinaPangelina

customer_reviews.title: Trail Mix Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Trail Mix arrived damaged. Sadly, there does not appear to be a way to contact seller or return beyond this feedback. I have received several before that arrived in good shape and were delicious, but this one had a weird rip at the top with contents spilled from bag all over box. It looked like it was either ripped or mice got into, so obviously I don't want to consume... please give a way to resolve...
customer_reviews.author: D Massey

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Trail Mix
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has no added, salt,sugar, fat,non GMO and vegan. The nuts are large and lots of seeds, nuts and berries without su;fur dioxide. I love the crunch and can use it with yogurt, cereal and by itself. Delicious. I plan on purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Marie

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Natural
customer_reviews.text: Healthy, wholesome trail mix. Simply nuts and dried berries. There's no sugar, preservatives, or BS. Little expensive, but the variety in each mix, and quality are well worth it. Tastes phenomenal too; can tell everything's extremely fresh.
customer_reviews.author: coolfool182

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste!! Nasty!! Not what I wanted at all!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly they taste like chemicals and preservatives !! I can’t eat a handful without tasting a horrible chemically taste in my mouth ! Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gershaw

customer_reviews.title: RAISINS UGH
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. No added sugars/oils to the dried fruit which is hard to find in a commercial product! Would give it 5 stars if it did not have raisins.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Quirl

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting trail mix. So good Ive already ordered my next bag
customer_reviews.text: this trail mix is outstanding. Lots of sweet tasting fruits and seeds to give it a unique, healthy taste. Great for that afternoon snack to eliminate the hunger before dinner. I would definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Heakthy snack of fruit and nuts.
customer_reviews.text: The product is delicious and healthy. My only disappointment is that I thought it would be in a large tin, instead of a plastic pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh and keeps well.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a really good mix. There seemed to be equal servings of each food. The cherries were pretty tart but everything was fresh. Everyone that tried it liked it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamster19

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a relative that was stationed in Afghanistan. I sent it through the app address along with a few other healthy snacks. This was her favorite and she is going to be ordering it for herself now that she's back in the states.
customer_reviews.author: mary bogart

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a healthy bedtime snack: Jackpot!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews often (lazy) but I have to say: I opened this stuff up, took a few specific pieces out (what are godenberries? What are white mulberries?) Well, I found out and it's all DELICIOUS. The berries are sweet and tart and the nut mixture is perfect--sometimes when you buy trail mix, it's loaded with the cheaper items like raisins. This is a great mix of everything. If I didn't have almost a full bag of this stuff, I'd be ordering more right now.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Tastes stale and bland to me.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it's rated high here. The nuts were good but the berries tasted like they're stale. I also had to take out left out stalks from the berries -- it shouldn't be there. And finally, I don't like the blend which seems too sweet and bland.
customer_reviews.author: ayush3504

customer_reviews.title: Addicting real food, no B.S.
customer_reviews.text: Was just looking for a brand that finally had raw ingredients with nothing added; preservatives, excess salts, no sugar, nothing but nature and the sun. Don’t no why that’s so hard to ask of our products. Nature has been doing something right and man comes along thinking he knows best creates something calls it food or safe to be consumed like food and it’s no wonder we have walking zombies around.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rolph

customer_reviews.title: Trail mix
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what Goji berries are but is a great mix and awesome to find a trail mix without added sugar and other junk that’s nutritious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cocao nibs.
customer_reviews.text: This was okay. It is tasty however the cocao nibs were so tiny yet they overwhelmed the whole trail mix and I would end up with nibs in the baggies I packed for work and no nuts. I don’t think I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CindyC

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good mix and I'm enjoying it. I don't like the golden berries, but that's my personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: woowka41

customer_reviews.title: Fresh ingredients but not clean.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this trail mix, but it did have a problem with shell skins, and hard to mix. 4 stars rating for flavors.
customer_reviews.author: CombatNam

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Very nice really good lots of nuts and great mix very delicious. Really well done. Can't stop eating it 😆
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Great taste; however
customer_reviews.text: The mix is fresh and tastes pretty good. I gave it 3 stars for the price and nutritional facts. I would have given it 3 1/2 stars if that choice was available. 1/2 Star off for the nutritional facts and ingredients being wrong on the package. 1 Star off for price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect salad topping.
customer_reviews.text: Packed with protein and really delicious! With a great selection of unusual dried berries and nuts. I don’t think there’s added sugar, anyway so tasty and good value. Nuts are expensive these days and there’s a lot of crap out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This are fantastic. Excelente quality. And also, I discovered the golden berries, they are sooo good! Tart, plan and slightly sweet, phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: E747TX

customer_reviews.title: very good nuts
customer_reviews.text: this mix actually tastes good, better than all others i have tried on amazon so far. in retrospect their nut mixes are my favorites (no fruit, just fat and protein), but this trail mix is good
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and good for you
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son visiting from out west and he loved this mix. He completely finished the bag within a day!
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Tasting, Fresh and Very Good Mix.....Highly Recommend This Product...
customer_reviews.author: dw78667

customer_reviews.title: Hard to stay out of
customer_reviews.text: Am awaiting my third bad of trail mix and each time have tried something different and have been super happy with them all
customer_reviews.author: rockergal

customer_reviews.title: Delious
customer_reviews.text: I have to eat low sugar products. This only has 2g no added sugar. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: A frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Replaced another trail-mix with this one and it is much better. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this. Raw nuts, no sugar added. Delicious, good price and good for my body. Great combination. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good the bag doesn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mix! It’s very addicting as everything is fresh and the flavors and textures are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: OMG! these are so good, needs to come in MUCH LARGER bags!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Spread it out
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of the price but beyond that it was delicious. In fact almost too delicious! I got it because I wanted a healthy snack option but with how much I enjoyed it I probably ate too much in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Snack
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh and full of delightfully nutritious raw foods. I love the combination of nuts, seed, and dried fruits. So delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.RoseMarie

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Very yummy and satisfying. I was put off by the price point initially but you get what you pay for and this mix is worth every penny! My whole family loves it. Great way to get those Omega 3's!
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Best Trail
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this trail mix. I eat it alone as a protein snack, or put on a salad. DELICIOUS !!!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best trailmix Ever
customer_reviews.text: After an intense workout at the gym on an empty stomach, I finished them all in one sitting. These were so good, I couldn't stop myself. It filled me up. This trail mix (Works) is high quality, nutritious and extremely fresh. I literally just purchased two more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good, I eat it at work for lunch
customer_reviews.text: Very good, I eat it at work for lunch , good taste and very filling , lasted a long time too , almost a week , better for me than chip
customer_reviews.author: Tjelliott

customer_reviews.title: Even with the sealed bag, it weight less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Even with the sealed bag, it weight less than 20oz. So it's probably about 18.5 oz inside the bag. I usually get at or slight more than advertised but in this case, it's less.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cho

customer_reviews.title: good but not a fan of goji berries
customer_reviews.text: good but not a fan of goji berries . tastes chemical to me ... but was my first time tasting at all so not far to assume. LOVE the fact its not got salt, sugar or gmo ... just not wild about goji.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: A great flavorful blend of dried fruits and nuts. Perfect for an afternoon pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found these.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Fresh taste and great 24oz size. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: A. LUNA

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great pick me up for energy. Only problem is I'm eating too much of them!
customer_reviews.author: Camigda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. Packaging sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, delicious flavor but so hard to open and close the packaging. I don’t mind since I can just find a new zip lock container but it matters truly for the sake of keeping it fresh for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Changyi

customer_reviews.title: All raisins
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, mostly raisins, takes up most of the weight. I would have preferred more nuts, but they cost more....
customer_reviews.author: traveler582

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, healthy mix. Low in sugar. High in fiber. Quality ingredients. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: PSwitty

customer_reviews.title: Too many sunflower seeds for my liking
customer_reviews.text: Very good mix. However there were far too many sunflower seeds in it as opposed to everything else, which was a bit of a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Remybuxaplenty

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Best trail mix I have tried, and I have tried several.
customer_reviews.author: Co&Be

customer_reviews.title: Goji berries!
customer_reviews.text: Best trail mix I've ever had. Period. Goji berries, sweet goji berries! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Money Mustache

customer_reviews.title: Too Tart!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this trail mix because there was no added sugar applied to their dry fruits. Overall I rate this product a 3 because the dry fruits were to tart for my liking. The fruit taste like they were processed before their mature stage.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Marius

customer_reviews.title: Nom Nom Nom Nom
customer_reviews.text: Nom Nom Nom Nom...I'm eating this as I type this review. Sooo good. Quality product. I should have ordered two bags!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Very good and tasty but they but too much sunflower seeds
customer_reviews.text: Very good and tasty but they but too much sunflower seeds. i found that to be a bit annoying as its too much. compared to everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Hernadez

customer_reviews.title: This is what I've been looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: I've started a diet where I've cut out oil and processed sugars. I thought I would never be able to have trail mix again, but lo and behold a trail mix that's organic, non-GMO and on top of it all oil-free and sugar-free! Woohoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Burch

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my Son & d-I-l. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Love these convenient snacks. I take them with me in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Weller

customer_reviews.title: This was very good and fresh
customer_reviews.text: This was very good and fresh, would have given 5 stars but would have liked more nuts and less fruit.. otherwise very good
customer_reviews.author: angelac

customer_reviews.title: Nuts
customer_reviews.text: Look great quick delivery however inside seal broke when received - Nuts everywhere in box!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Masciarelli-Behanick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Definetly as raw as any nuts and berries you can get. Love it. Didn't like the packaging that much, but impressed by price, quality, and size.
customer_reviews.author: Trapmulatto

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order of this item. This time we ordered 4 bags so we would not run out so quickly! Great product and fast shipping. God Bless, Ward and Mary.
customer_reviews.author: Ward P. Barnes

product_meta.title: Raw Superfoods Trail Mix - The Works (Goji Berries, Golden Berries, Mulberries, Raisins, Brazil Nuts, Cashews, Walnuts, Pumpkin and Sunflower Seeds)
feature_bullets: A healthy and delicious combination of organic goji berries, organic golden berries, organic white mulberries, brazil nuts, cashews, California walnuts, premium California thompson select raisins, pumpkin and sunflower seeds
Made from all-natural, non-GMO raw ingredients with no further processing
All fruits are naturally sun-dried, unsweetened, not treated with oil and with no sulphur dioxide or any other preservative being used
Free of artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. No added sugar, salt or fat
PACK SIZE: Contains 1 bag of 24 oz (680g) net weight.
